meanings.sent1: The curtain was tasselled with colorful threads.
meanings.sent2: She wore a tasselled scarf to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the tasselled fringe, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The tasselled edges of the pillow added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The tasselled trim on the dress swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: The tasselled keychain jingled as she walked.
meanings.sent2: The old lamp had a tasselled lampshade.
meanings.sent3: He found a tasselled umbrella forgotten at the park.
meanings.sent4: The tasselled bookmark peeked out from the pages of the book.
meanings.sent5: The tasselled edges of the carpet added a cozy touch to the room.

meanings.sent1: The tasselled tablecloth added a festive touch to the dining table.
meanings.sent2: The tasselled banner fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent3: She gifted her friend a tasselled keychain as a souvenir.
meanings.sent4: The tasselled curtains framed the window beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The tasselled trim on the pillowcases matched the bedspread perfectly.
